subject: Television
Basketball
lead_paragraph: ESPN, ABC and TNT will continue to carry the N.B.A. through the 2015-16 season under contracts that will let them exploit the league’s digital rights more extensively than in the past.
snippet: ESPN, ABC and TNT will continue to carry the N.B.A. through the 2015-16 season under contracts that will let them exploit the league’s digital rights more extensively than in the past.
